official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit for hazard mitigation projects in connection with certain working waterfront property.
short_title: Working Waterfront Disaster Mitigation Tax Credit Act

summary.text:
Working Waterfront Disaster Mitigation Tax Credit Act 

This bill allows a new tax credit equal to 30% of the amount of investment in a working waterfront mitigation project. A mitigation project is designed to prevent or mitigate damage to working waterfront property by using structural elevation, flood risk reduction, shoreline stabilization, floodproofing, retrofitting, and warning systems.
